body.name: VIVO Electric Height Adjustable 63 x 32 inch Memory Stand Up Desk, Black Table Top, Black Frame, Touch Screen Preset Controller, 2E Series, DESK-KIT-2E1B
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 22 - 26. Order within 6 hrs 8 mins.
features: Create Instant Active Standing - Go from sitting to standing in one smooth motion with this complete workstation providing comfortable viewing angles and customized user heights.

Spacious 3-Piece 63" Top - The large table top measuring 63.1" x 31.5" (28" at center) offers plenty of room for a variety of monitor and laptop setups along with important work projects and office supplies. Please Note: All 3 sections of the table top must be used.

Height Adjustment - Enjoy a height range of 29.5" to 49.6" with this frame's powerful, quiet motor and strong legs that let you transition from sitting to standing in seconds. The elegant controller touch screen features customizable memory settings and helpful timer reminders.

Strong Desk Frame Support - With all-steel construction, the desk frame is able to support up to 176 lbs with maximum stability and sturdiness. The desktop is made of particle board for a scratch-resistant surface.

We've Got You Covered - This complete standing workstation is backed with a 3 Year Manufacturer Warranty and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns. Please Note: This desk is made up of 2 cartons, the desk frame and the desk top.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We’ve combined the electric height adjustable desk frame, DESK-V102E, and spacious table top, DESK-TOP1B, for the complete Electric Standing Desk with Table Top Package (DESK-KIT-2E1B) from VIVO! The frame allows you to find that much needed healthy balance between sitting and standing throughout the long work day, and height adjustment is made easy with the smooth, powerful motor. The desktop is a trendy matte black color with a curved, modern shape so your new desk blends with any environment. With a frame constructed of solid steel, it supports up to 176 lbs and is built to last. The table top’s integrated cable management system ensures that cords and cables are neatly organized and hidden from view for a tidy workspace that encourages concentration. The desk platform comes packaged in 3 sections, and all necessary hardware is provided to get your desk frame put together and mounted to your desktop in no time!

COMPLETE WORKSTATION No need to worry about finding a trendy table surface and desk frame that are sold separately, hoping they fit together. This complete height adjustable workstation was created to make your search for an electric sit to stand desk easier and more convenient. The large size provides space for multi-monitor setups and important work materials. TELESCOPIC HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT An easy transition between sitting and standing is made possible by a powerful, quiet, and smooth single motor lift system with overload and heat protection. Adjustable feet keep your desk level and adapt to most any floor surface. VIVO Office Products Whether at home or in the office, we want you to achieve the successes in life and business that you've set out to reach. VIVO products are created to eliminate the distractions and discomfort of outdated workspaces, so you can focus on the task at hand and enjoy the work that's important to you. SPECS Items: 2 (Steel Desk Frame and MDF Table Top)Table Top Dimensions: 63.1” x 31.5” x 0.75”Desk Frame Dimensions: 40” to 61” (Length), 29.5" to 49.6" (Height)Motor: 1.5” / second (Maximum Speed), 100V - 240V (Input), 10%, Max. 2 minutes on/18 minutes off (Duty Cycle)Frame Weight Capacity: 176 lbs FULL DESK ADJUSTMENT VIVO SPECS
TAKE YOUR WORKSTATION TO THE NEXT LEVEL Check out our accessories below!

STAND-V002 STAND-V000D DESK-SKIRT Series MOUNT-PC01 DN-CH-K01B DESK-AC04D Title Dual Monitor Desk Mount Laptop and Monitor Riser Cable Management Desk Skirt Under Desk and Wall PC Mount Ergonomic Kneeling Chair Under Desk Pencil Drawer Use Raise two monitor screens to an ergonomic viewing angle for all day comfort. Raise your laptop to a comfortable viewing and typing position. Hide those messy cables with our easy-to-mount privacy desk skirt. Get your PC off of the floor for convenient placement. Experience the posture benefits of standing and the relief of sitting. Reduce clutter by creating extra storage for pens, pencils, notepads, and more. Color(s) Black, White Black Black Black, White Black, White Black Size / Compatibility Fits 13" to 27" Screens Fits Laptops up to 16" and Monitors up to 24" 30" Panel / 60" Panel Width: 3.5" to 8", Height: 12" to 21" 250 lbs Weight Capacity 17" x 11.5" Dimensions Compatible with DESK-KIT-2E1B ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

USING YOUR CONTROL PANEL… Install the Control Panel This is the part where you get to grab your electric drill! Simply attach the controller to the underside of the desktop using the provided ¾” screws. Adjust to the Desired Height To adjust the desk, press and hold the up or down arrow. After 60 seconds, the panel will show sleep mode, “---”. To wake it up again, simply touch the screen. Press “M” to Store Setting To save your preferred height, press “M”. The letter “S-” will be displayed. Then press “1”, “2”, or “3” within 5 seconds to store the height in memory. Set Helpful Reminders Set the timer by pressing “T”. The display will flash “0.5h” (30 minutes). Then press “T” repeatedly to increase the time frame (up to 2 hours).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, smooth, quiet desk. Read for shipping and assembly tips/warnings.
reviews.reviewText: PHOTOSYeah, I need to do some cord management. Yeah, son's room is messy.LIKES1. Very solid desk.2. Very quiet and fast motor operation.3. Scratch-resistant surface.4. The memory features for sit and stand are nice and easy to operate. They will give my son a chance to stand and burn off some energy while remote learning by just pushing one button, ensuring ergonomic consistency.DISKLIKES1. Surface of desk is prone to fingerprints.2. [minor] While the three settings for height memory are nice, it would have been nicer to have four. Assuming the most common use cases are "sit" and "stand", the third setting seems like a third wheel on a hot date. Having four settings would have better accommodated two people's sit and stand preferences.3. The "screen saver" function is bit weird. After 90 seconds the control panelthat displays the height will instead show "---" (apparently the screensaver, like that's so much more efficient than showing the number) and not accept any input. In order to use the desk again you have to press "M" for three seconds. But then after 10 minutes the whole display shuts off and you have to press the display to turn it on. It is supposed to prevent accidental pressing of buttons, but that seems like an edge case to me and less-intuitive redundancy to the power-off feature.SHIPPINGFor me the desk came in two different boxes which wasn't indicated in the tracking. One box contained the three paneled top, which I received first. Then a few days later the motorized stand came. The boxes were in bad shape, but all of the parts were there and the pieces were well-packaged.ASSEMBLYAssembly was fairly straight-forward. But here are a few things to look out for:1. When assembling the motorized stand you have to adjust the width to match the top in one of the early steps; however at that stage you don't know what exact width it needs to be to align with the holes on the top. So I recommend not tightening the slider part until the end after you put the top on so you can finely adjust the underlying frame's width to align with the top's screw holes. So for me I finely adjusted the width after putting the top on and tightened the slider. Then I installed the variable-length metal rod for the motor last.2. There were no instructions for the top, but it wasn't too hard to figure out. Line up the three panels on the floor upside down (screw holes showing) with the rectangular piece in the middle and all cord-management holes aligned. Then you'll see that the two supplied bars lay across all three panels and align with the holes.3. Before putting on the top, the instructions say to put these sticky pads with holes in them over the frame screw holes for padding. However, those white pads were thick and once the top was on the screws to screw from the frame into the top weren't long enough to get a bite with that pad in-between. Removing the pads with great vengeance and furious anger caused the screws to then go in quite easily.4. The control panel (where you push the buttons up and down) has two holes to secure it to the underside of the desk. However, the hole pattern under the desk didn't match the hole pattern for the control panel. So you can utilize one of the desktop holes in the pattern for an easy screw-in. For the other hole you'll have to use one of the supplied pointy screws to drill into the underside of the desk. If you don't have a drill then your options are more limited. But I think a piece of 3M double-sided stick pad or double sided tape would work just fine. It's light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this desk
reviews.reviewText: Pros:-moderately easy to assemble-beautiful desk top, water resistant (I got the light color and love the look)-sturdy metal legs-smooth up and down functions, very easy to raise and lower down-good value for money spent-spacious top-I like the curved version, I feel like I can be more comfortable while slightly closer than the table ends and the contour feels nice for placing items on the ends (water bottle, notebook, etc.)-height range is very nice, goes higher than I would ever need it-customer service helped me fix a sync rod issue, which was a big relief-standing functions have been really great for my workflow and chronic painCons:-table top in three parts can be a bit finnicky at times-desk can feel wobbly, especially at full height, but never dangerously so-a big task to build; I severely injured my back setting mine up and couldn’t walk for an entire week, but this was not the company’s fault. I would suggest building it on an elevated surface (not the floor) if possible. Even with help, the metal legs are very heavy. Just be careful when building this desk and avoid my mistakeOverall, I really like this desk and I’m very glad that I bought it. I work from home and have found it so much better to be able to switch positions throughout the day/night. Love the size and range, thankful for their customer service. I also love the contoured version and wouldn’t want to go back to a rectangular table top or non-standing desk. Just be wary of wobbliness and be careful when building if you’re already dealing with back pain like I am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So glad I bought this desk
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write reviews but I was so happy with this purchase I decided to write one. This desk met all my expectations and delivered beyond that. I received the desk last week and set it up last Friday. Overall 5 stars but I only gave four stars on the assembly because the directions were not as good as they could be. On the plus side I called their customer service once at 5pm on Friday - they answered! and chatted a online a second time around 6 (open Mon-Fri till 7pm). They were super responsive and cleared things up both times. The desk went together GREAT and is solid.Features I think are worth noting and considering:Desktop. This desk is 31.5" deep - many are only 24 inches... thats a big difference - this one is 30% deeper. Gives me plenty of space in front of my monitors and keyboard. The length is 63" - again great working space. It feels super comfortable. to work on and leaves plenty of room. I have the black surface and really like it - cleans up easy and seems very durable.Cable Management: Excellent rating here. With my double monitor set up I am sooo glad there are three (3) cable ports in the desk top. I wouldn't have looked for that- but glad I have it. The under-table cable management tray is a good size as well and hold almost everything I have to stuff in there.Electric raising system: Not sure why the transformer for the motor has to be so large - it fits in the cable tray but takes up about 1/3 of the tray. The memory position system works great. Raise and Lower function is smooth and quiet. I was going to a pneumatic raise and lower - so glad I didn't- this works really nice - hope it lasts- seems solid. Lastly a feature I didnt think about was the timer... you can set a timer on the control to remind you to switch from sit/stand. That is really actually very useful.So this was a recent purchase so I am hoping reliability is good - but I have found products so well thought out with features usually are well engineered too... if anything goes south I'll get back on here with an update.
Desk was easy to assemble & works well. Only minor issue is setting the automatic desk heights does not as per instructions provided.

The table is fantastic. Assembly was fairly simple there's also a youtube video how to assemble if your don't like reading instructions. Very smooth and quiet motor functions. Plenty of room for everything including the pc. This is a 38 inch ultra wide on my desk. Easily can handle the weight. The only 2 complaints I have and not really a big deal the table might not be right for everyone unless you don't mind sitting higher up. At its lowest point is roughly 30 inches. And my second gripe is the separation on the the table itself is not perfectly flush so where the cuts in the table top join together run on my wrists. Other than that nothing but good things it's a fantastic gaming table great for long sessions. And if you get tired of sitting just raise it up with a simple touch and you can now have a standing work station. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's one of the best desks I have ever owned
reviews.reviewText: Easy to setup but the diagram can be miss leading sometimes. Had to re assemble only one part after 2 steps. But very easy to use. Very big, sturdy, and can be adjusted fast. And is quiet. I love it sofar.

Happy with this purchase, love being able to sit/stand on a moment's notice, my back/legs/nerves are appreciative. The base is heavy and fairly solid, only slight wobble when the desk is raised up near it's maximum (which is way higher than I will ever need), the curved front edge helps get closer to 2nd monitor and gives a little extra useable space, but not a ton, would almost rather just have a few inches deeper and rectangular.Having the top split into 3 pieces is good for delivery but assembling the 3 pieces together was more difficult than expected, the metal blocks used to connect them are very difficult to thread the screws through because of the plastic washer inserts - had to spend a long time finagling the screws into place. The top is sturdy enough but fairly thin and plastically feeling.The touchscreen controller is adequate however it sometimes takes multiples of taps (like 5 or 6) to get it to wake, once awake the touch sensitivity is decent. The length of included cabling is quite limited to where you can mount the controller so they probably should just have pre-drilled the holes in the ideal location from the factory.The included cable management works well though I wish the holes through the top were set further back and in a different position so I could put my monitor further back - it interferes with the monitor stand, If you used a different monitor stand it might not be an issue.I would buy this again but not at a higher price than the $399CAD I paid for it.
It was easy to assemble, and looks good. I like the functionality, the programming for hight settings was easy and works great.
